features: Reveal Your Most Radiant Self: Experience real kojic acid soap that helps make skin tone brighter and clearer. Kojie San Soap is effective in helping diminish the visibility of dark spots, freckles, acne, stretch marks, uneven skin tone, and other skin tone problems.

Flawless Skin from Head to Toe: Original Kojie San Kojic Acid Soap is a wonderful facial soap for women and men, that also moisturizes and helps achieve perfect skin appearance. Use this bar soap to reduce hyperpigmentation, improve underarms and dark looking skin on inner thighs, face and neck.

Lather in Quality Ingredients: We know how sensitive sun damaged skin can be, so our bar soap for face and body has glycerin, tea tree, coconut oil, and other natural ingredients to cleanse your skin gently.

Say Goodbye to Dark Spots: This fresh orange-scented skin soap has Zero Pigment Light Technology to target areas that need extra care to give you more even, smoother glowing skin. Truly the perfect Japanese soap bar.

Home of the Original Kojic Acid Soap: Kojie San’s formulation blends effective ingredients to nourish your skin and target blemishes to reveal your inner beauty! Check your product’s authenticity with our Hidden Tag technology.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: REVEAL YOUR MOST RADIANT SELF Experience real kojic acid soap brightening that combats hyperpigmentation, sun & age spots, & other blemishes with the authentic Kojie San Soap. Wash away your skin problems with our professional strength kojic soap. FLAWLESS SKIN FROM HEAD TO TOE The Kojie San Kojic Acid Soap is a face soap for women & men, as well as a moisturizing bar soap for body. Use our hyperpigmentation soap as an underarm soap, dark skin remover for inner thighs, face bar soap, or black neck remover. LATHER IN QUALITY INGREDIENTS We know how sensitive sun damaged skin can be, so our brightening bar soap for face & body has glycerin, tea tree, coconut oil, & other natural ingredients to cleanse your skin gently. SAY GOODBYE TO DARK SPOTS This fresh orange soap-scented skin brightener soap has Zero Pigment Light Technology to target areas that need extra care to give you more even, smoother glowing skin. Truly the perfect Japanese soap bar.

WHAT IS KOJIC ACID? Kojic acid is a natural ingredient derived from mushrooms or produced as a byproduct of fermenting sake, soy sauce, rice wine, & miso. It has a long history of use in Japanese culture & is considered a key component of traditional Japanese skincare. WHAT’S IN EVERY KOJIE SAN PRODUCT? Kojie San offers unique formulations free of parabens & other additives, & are rich with naturally derived extracts that help even your skin tone & address other common skin concerns. WHAT SKIN PROBLEMS DOES IT TARGET? Our face & body products help lessen the appearance of age spots, freckles, red marks, scars, hyperpigmentation, & other visible signs of sun damage. By targeting these skin concerns, our products aim to improve the overall look & texture of your skin, leaving it looking more youthful & radiant. HOME OF THE ORIGINAL KOJIC ACID SOAP Kojie San offers a unique range of skincare products that have been helping people achieve more beautiful, radiant skin for years. Its unique formula features Kojic Acid, which prevents the UV-activation of tyrosinase, which then limits the pigmentation production.

Kojie San Zero Pigment Light Beauty Soap Kojie San Cleanser & Toner Kojie San 5-Pc Set with Travel Pouch Kojie San Kojic Acid Soap with Facial Brush Kojie San 2-Pc Set Kojie San Beauty Soap with Soap Net Inclusions/Key Ingredients Kojic Acid, Coconut Oil, & Tea Tree Oil Kojic Acid, Mushroom & Ginseng Extract, Rose Hip Oil Soap:Kojic Acid, Coconut Oil,&Tea Tree Oil Lotion:Kojic Acid,Rose Hip Oil,Collagen,& Vitamin E Face Cream:Kojic Acid,Rose Hip,&Vitamin E Cleanser & Toner:Kojic Acid,Mushroom & Ginseng Extract,Rose Hip Oil Facial Cleansing Brush Travel Pouch Deep Pore Facial Cleansing Brush Soap: Kojic Acid, Coconut Oil, & Tea Tree Oi Soap: Kojic Acid, Coconut Oil, & Tea Tree Oil Face Cream: Kojic Acid, Rose Hip Oil, & Vitamin E Exfoliating Soap Net Soap: Kojic Acid, Coconut Oil, & Tea Tree Oil Mild Scent ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Formulated with Kojic Acid ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Suitable for Face & Body Face & Body Face & Body Face & Body Face & Body Face & Body For All Skin Types ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This does work
reviews.reviewText: I've had melasma and sun damage that popped up about 6 years ago (I'm 46 years old). It just seemed to get worse with every year and I never felt confident without makeup. Furthermore when I wore makeup, it barely covered my dark patches. I found this and took the advice to cut the soap in smaller pieces. I go through a small piece in about a month. I use this nightly however, I make sure my makeup is thoroughly removed and my skin is cleansed. I use this as a treatment. I suds it up in my hands and put it on my face, targeting my bad areas. I let it sit about 30 seconds to a full minute then I rinse. I do not use it in the morning, only at night. I've probably been at this about 6 months, using that routine consistently every night. This has completely gotten rid of almost all of my darkness. I have been able to leave the house without make and I feel my skin us the best it's ever been. When I do wear makeup, one light layer works fine as I do not have to cover anything anymore. I won't be without this soap. I have one small wedge left and I just reordered. If my story sounds like yours, give this a try and be consistent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works wonders, don’t second guess just buy it!
reviews.reviewText: So far I’m feeling the difference in my skin, of course it’s going to take a little more time to see a drastic change, but I am seeing a subtle shift in the appearance of my skin. I’ll upload photos within a few weeks so that you’ll be able to see it that it does indeed work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does The Job
reviews.reviewText: When I first used this soap my skin burned so bad, but slowly went away. After the first wash, I think my skin got used to it because it either didn't burn or was not as bad as the first time. Also, this soap dried out my skin but I just use a moisturizer after use. It does smell good/ok. No complaints about how it smells. Does it work? I only use this once in a while, i honestly don't know.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: First thing the soap smells so good, it gives a good lather on the soap is great .it leaves your face feeling sotf after washing. Most important the box Contains not 1 but two soap bars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars love hate product
reviews.reviewText: i bought this soap because i have a lot of acnes, and I really wanted to remove them or reduce them because i've been seeing wonderful reviews about this soap. unfortunately this was not really my case.I am down 1 bar of this soap from consistent nightly use. at first it was working amazing, my acne's were slowing down, removed lot of darker spots on my face, but then came the bad, my skin started drying really bad, shedding even, like i would wear a lot of lotion on my face every hour or so my face won't stay white. because my skin was pealing. I continued using because I though it was normal, but then my skin started burning, every night while applying my moisturizer, i had to put ice on my face to not feel the burn. if i get under the sun at any point, i feel like my face is on fire. I really wasn't able to continue using the soap anymore. but it really started helping. my face color started to even out. but unfortunately it's a no for me

reviews.reviewText: Look but this product let me tell you guys that I have been using this for only 2 weeks now and I’m seeing my skin being even out I will buy this a million times if I had the money lol😂 but it’s great and works 100%
